```{r}
library(googlesheets4)
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()
surveys <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VlOw-lx0WSUFPmV2Q5vI69XbOL-1d-04K71k6sZ-nZQ/edit?usp=sharing")

```

There are 5 functions in the Math-a-magical™

1)lineproj - this script takes your data and plots it as a line graph

2)nosmoking - this script will delete any numerical data equal to 420... lung cancer is serious

3)linearmodel2 - This script will create a linear model of the data

4)colcount- if you wanted to know how many columns you have if using there are too many for the header() function to work easily

5)removena -  a simple script that Removes NA values from your data frame
